name: Little Maddie Dear
storyline:
"Hey, have you heard about it?"

"About the Attic?"

"They say if you go up the Stairs, there is a way to reach Paradise - a place where all your wishes can come true."

Little Maddie Dear is a maze-runner game about the journey of little Madison, who wishes to find Paradise at the top of the stairs. The game is set into five main stages each with different themes, an increasing variety of enemy types, and new obstacles, making every stage harder to complete. Players are assisted with up to three different helpful skills unlocked at each stage. Use food items to increase your chances of survival. Monsters lurk at every corner and nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the dark truth or will this end in fantasy?

This game is made for the Kill the Cutie event.
